security_audit.summary: Official skill content with documentation-only guidance. No executable code or risky behavior is present in the scanned files. Safe for marketplace publication.

content.user_title: Build a plugin skill the right way
content.value_statement: Creating a skill can feel unclear without structure or examples. This guide gives a step by step process, checklists, and patterns for Claude Code plugin skills.
actual_capabilities: Explain required skill structure and file layout for plugin skills
Provide a step by step skill creation workflow
Define writing style rules for SKILL.md content
List validation checks for frontmatter, triggers, and references
Describe progressive disclosure and resource placement
limitations: Does not include executable scripts or automated validation
Does not generate files or templates directly
Does not cover non plugin skill packaging processes in detail
Requires user supplied examples and domain content

use_cases.title: Create a new skill
use_cases.description: Plan structure, write SKILL.md, and organize references for a new Claude Code plugin skill.

use_cases.title: Improve skill clarity
use_cases.description: Refine trigger phrases, writing style, and progressive disclosure for existing skills.

use_cases.title: Standardize skill quality
use_cases.description: Apply the validation checklist to ensure consistent skill design across a plugin.

prompt_templates.title: Start a skill
prompt_templates.scenario: Define a skill for a new plugin feature
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me plan a new Claude Code plugin skill for validating hooks. Ask for examples, then outline resources and SKILL.md sections.

prompt_templates.title: Rewrite description
prompt_templates.prompt: Rewrite my SKILL.md frontmatter description with specific trigger phrases for users who ask to create or validate hooks.

prompt_templates.title: Structure review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review my skill structure and suggest what should move from SKILL.md into references or examples.

prompt_templates.title: Full validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Run a full checklist review for my skill and list any issues with frontmatter, writing style, references, or examples.

output_examples.input: Review this skill for Claude Code plugins and list improvements
output: Frontmatter description needs specific trigger phrases
SKILL.md body uses second person in two sections
References are missing for detailed patterns

best_practices: Use third person trigger phrases in frontmatter
Keep SKILL.md lean and move details to references
List and validate all referenced resources
anti_patterns: Write vague descriptions without user trigger phrases
Place all content in SKILL.md with no references
Use second person language in instructions

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude Code plugins only?
faq.answer: It is optimized for Claude Code plugin skills but general guidance may apply elsewhere.

faq.question: What are the main limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It provides guidance only and does not generate files or run validation scripts.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my existing plugin setup?
faq.answer: Yes, it assumes the standard plugin skills directory and SKILL.md structure.

faq.question: Does it handle or store data?
faq.answer: No, it only provides documentation guidance and does not process sensitive data.

faq.question: What should I do if my skill does not trigger?
faq.answer: Update the frontmatter description with explicit user phrases and test again.

faq.question: How does it compare to a generic skill creator?
faq.answer: It focuses on Claude Code plugin conventions and avoids generic packaging steps.
